original_title: 僕とRioとあいのの甘すぎる同棲性活 Rio 希志あいの
overview: Two transcendental beauties who are too cute gathered at my original room share! "Let me share the house, the bath, even you." The miracle co-starring of the strongest idol in the AV world has finally come true! !
title: My Super Sweet Cohabitation Life With Rio And Aino Kishi
